content.detailedDescription: I was outside with my father when he saw a gold orb/stucture in the sky. i saw it when it moved east, but he originally saw it in the west. he saw it earlier this month, and i was with him i just didn't see it in time. but tonight i saw it with my own eyes. i checked were the nearest satellites are and space stations but they're all beneath me on the other side of the earth.
content.summary: I was outside with my father when he saw a gold orb/stucture in the sky. i saw it when it moved east, but he originally saw it in the west.

content.detailedDescription:
Went out on the driveway to look for meteor showers. after a few minutes i saw a very bright, 1 second long flash of light directly above, many miles away. 7-10 seconds later another flash for 1 second in the same spot, then another and another all from the same spot in the sky. this went on for a couple of minutes. i ran in the house to grab my phone to check the iss app but the iss was over africa. it could have been a string of meteors entering the atmosphere from directly above i suppose, but that would be very unusual and satelites usually move across the sky. 
the light reminded me of a 100 watt light bulb viewed from maybe 500 ft away. there were no aircraft in the area at this time.
content.summary: Very bright flashing light twice the size of polaris, stationary, flashing at approximately 10 second intervals. watched for about 2 minutes. it never moved and no other lights.

content.detailedDescription: We where having a neighborhood bbq, sitting an the balcony socializing ( 7 people in total) when colin noticed a strange looking light in the sky. we all where talking about it because it never moved. it just hovered. we also noticed 5 very faint orb type light that moved around  the larger object very rapidly. in the blink of they eye they changed directions.  we eventually got some binoculars and got a better view. colin got his camera with a 300 ml zoom and started taking pictures. clouds started to move in but we where able witness a completely different object that approached this group. through the camera lens the new object appeared triangular like a stealth bomber. on approach the orbs got more active but the strange larger object never moved. the clouds eventually thickened and the view of the objects was lost.  in total it was roughly an hour long incident.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Witnessed one large bright object in the sky that did not move. it appeared to have 5 orbs that moved rapidly around the larger  cylander shape  object. ithe entire group was approached by something that  looked triangular which caused some movement .

content.detailedDescription:
At around 2:30, an object was witnessed by me and 7 other people. i asked for the binoculars and tried to zoom in in the object. it wasn't moving and was far and high up. it looked like it was changing shape, and it was hard to make the image clear. the object was in the north, then began to move away and up slowly. it then began to move to the east slowly unyil it completelt went away. it was a solid object, and seemed to have an appendage on top. the event happened over 45 minutes. planes were also seen, but there is a lot of air traffic around here.

at some point, i thought it was a planet, but then the proximity and movement quickly dismissed that idea. it was truly unknown and had no faa lights. strange occurencr for sure.
content.summary: Saw an object with 8 other witnesses hovering, then moving away finally moving east. event happened over 45 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: On 8/05/2017 departed on the durango to silverton train at about 9:00 am.As the train was traveling i was taking numerous photos of the breathtaking scenery until we reached silverton. later that evening at the motel i downloaded the photos from my camera to my laptop and was going over them.I noticed in one photo  that it had some kind of an object or bird looking thing in the background.I then zoomed the photo in and noticed it was some type of an object above one of the mountains.I was very surprised and to me it looked like a ufo. the only time i saw the object was in the photo and never noticed it as i took the photo.I still what it could be.
content.summary: Had taken photo of mountains noticed  object in photo.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving southwest down moon road with my daughter and my now ex wife, i saw some sort of huge disc object over a farm that is on a parallel road called stony creek rd. i pointed it out to here because honestly i thought i was hallucinating. she saw it as well and we were both stunned, we stared at it til we came to an intersection then made a left, watched it til we lost sight of it because of trees, then made another left on to stony creek road and where the disc was over the farm there was nothing there, it just vanished. i have no idea what it was or anything and at the time i hadn't really considered ufos to be a thing.. it seemed to be rotating slowly in a clockwise fashion, it was chrome or silver and reflected the sunlight. the dome part had white or bright yellow looking windows and it just kind of hovered probably 300 ft above ground from my vantage point. it was massive, probably 1000 ft across i would guess. i had a mixture of excitement and fear, i was an infantryman in the army and i'm pretty good in stressful situation, i didn't even think about it out take a picture of it at the time i was just in awe of it. i still have no clue as to what the object was, all i know is it was like nothing i have ever seen before or since.
content.summary: Saw massive disc like ufo over a farm near milan, mi

content.detailedDescription:
My boyfriend and i were just about to leave to see the meteor shower when i decided to look out the window at the sky. to my surprise we both witnessed a very large low flying orb that at first was stationary then floated very very slow toward the south. i had no camera handy but grabbed a pair of binoculars but could not get them to focus. it went behind the trees and i was unable to view it anymore. we both decided while watching it that it could not possibly be a plane or a helicopter.
it was too large, too bight and too slow.
content.summary: Large very bright orb out my window

content.detailedDescription: I was at the wisconsin state fair and decided to video in slo mo mode a bungee ride. i did not notice or see or hear anything, but the next day when i watched my video , the missile like object is clearly seen flying at a high speed. it looks like a black missile that shoots out of the horizon at a very high speed.At the 12 second mark watch from left to right a black object fly at a straight line above the people in the bungee.
content.summary: Had my iphone on slow mo video mode videoing a ride at the fair when i noticed the missile like object a day later

content.detailedDescription: I got up from my sleeping bag to check thunderstorms which were on my left and right. immediate observed 14 to 20 orbs of light heading rite over top me out of the north or northeast towards west or southwest direction. i heard no noise and saw no aircraft lights just bright orbs red,white, green, blue, and maybe orange. i looked closely to see if i saw flickering like chinese candles but saw no flickering. i thought to my self there all flying at 45 to 60 miles per hour candles would have blown out? i thought why would the military send a large group of flares out here? i can only say for sure that they were bright orbs of light flying together in a spread pattern all in the same direction.
content.summary: Set of 14 to 20 orbs heading directly overhead out of the north east headed southwest disappeared over houses on the horizon a couple miles away on hill.

content.detailedDescription:
I went in the back yard of my house in olathe, ks around 9:40 p.M., saturday night, august 12th, in hope of seeing a meteor during the perseid meteor shower. after staring in the ne sky for a short while, i saw a brief bright white flash about the size of a planet. afterward, i could faintly see two star-like objects. after a few seconds they disappeared. however, approximately 30 seconds later there was another brief bright flash in the same location. once again i could faintly discern two star-like objects. suddenly, one of the objects accelerated to an incredible speed and disappeared from view to the sw behind a tree in my yard. approximately 45 seconds later, the second object began moving slowly to the north. it slowly made a counter-clockwise u-turn then also accelerated an incredible rate of speed to the sw and also disappeared in less than a second.

i can't estimate the height of the objects but they were high--at least 10,000 feet or more. their speed was incredible--10 times faster than any meteor/meteoroid or conventional aircraft i've ever seen in my life. while it's just a guess, based on their estimated height and distance, they had to have gone from zero to around 5,000 mph in a millisecond. they went so fast they became a streak across the sky.

i couldn't believe what my eyes were seeing. my first reaction was awe, the second wonderment as to who/what could be piloting these craft, and the third was fear. i hoped they weren't aware of me but some reason felt they were. i was shaken by the experience. 

i have been a mufon field investigator (#19371) since 2011.
content.summary: Two faintly visible star-like objects one of wihch intermittently issued a bright flash.  first object accerlated to an incredible speed and disappeared to the sw. second object moved slowly n, made u-turn then disappeared to sw at an incredible speed.

content.detailedDescription: Saisie directe enquêteur 24198 / merci à marc st germain de m'affecter le cas pour saisie dans cms
content.summary: Saisie directe enquêteur 24198 / pour affectation du cas et traitement

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my vacation on korkyra island in croatia (europe) and like every morning i take a ride to the town to get a coffee. i saw a beautifull sunrise above the old town so i stop the car and take a photo with my iphone. it has live photo and makes two pics in one second. in my iphone im able to click to each photo and then a have a few frames to see before the final photo is shown (like a mini video, a cool feature).
and that was it.
after few days i want to post some photos on fb so i started to search the best...And then i notice something strange - i've had two pics, one is normal and on the other it pops up some flying object from nowhere. i was confused because i didnt remember that i saw something like that when i take a shot. i was concentrated to make a nice photo, there where a lot of sun, and i wanted to make it quick because i was at the road with my car. the photos were taken just outside the town of korcula, with a nice view to the monastry of st. nikola. both photos are taken in a fraction of a second and has this "video efect" so it is very clear that ufo on second photo appears out of nowhere. when i realize that maybe i have something interesting i was so excited so i went to my husband to show the photos. he is an amateur but passionate photographer and he was astonished. after closer examination he concluded that this is no some anomaly on lens or something and it seems that definitely it is a real flying object. when you use the iphone feature you can see the movement of the bird in the beam of light in the position above the object so you can actually see the quick time that passed from the moment the 2 photos where taken and also clearly the moment of the appearance of the ufo. it seams to us that this is a small spaceship or a small explorer ship used just for expeditions from a mother spacecraft. it is hard to say what is the size of the flaying object but is sems to us that is abut 3 or 4 meter. if you look at other elemnts on the photos and compare it the ufo you will see that the bright and dark regions are just perfectly fitting, refecting the sun correcly since it seam that the ufo is flying at a small angle and little descending, too. precisely because of that angle there is light reflecting from the ufo, the most from behind and some also on the front forwards. the strong light reflecting from the back side must be from some highly reflective material and it seams to us that this could be a part where the propulsion system is located. the small reflection of light on the front it seams that this is from the cabin. we also applied several filters to the photo to see how the ufo object looks comparing to other objects and everything  is looking perfecly normal.
content.summary: Strange pop up on live photo

content.detailedDescription: I went outside for a cigarette about 7.30am on 13 august 2017. i noticed a light moving at speed. thought nothing of it until i seen it just stop dead and get brighter. really bright. thought it was the sun reflecting off a plane until it stopped moving. so i went into the house and got my benoculars thinking it was a planet. then i noticed it had mass and i was looking at a ufo with a flat grey outer body colour and was a distinct shape of a h but a narrow h two long cylinders with a round bit connecting in the middle. it looked like well best way i can describe is it had the effect on exterior like in the film district 9 same as the alien life boat. rugged and battered well used is another word. lots of white lights on the underside wich made me think it was changing shape but it was the lights movin around. i watched it for a further 5 mins as it moved to overtake and avoid a large plane. then it just accelerated away over the houses.
content.summary: H shaped object with mass showing intelligence and great speed

content.detailedDescription: I was getting into my car at the shell station @ main and carew st. saw something shiny that caught my eye. at first thought it was just a plane, but it came closer to me i saw it was a spinning, shiny metal disc. it hovered a few seconds and i got out of the car absolutely awe struck. my jaw was on the ground. the disc then moved up and down side to side and traversed towards and away from me. as i fumbled to grab my cell phone to take a picture it seemed to either dissapear or just get far enough where i couldn't see it, came back for maybe 3 seconds, then was gone again. at that point i looked around with amazement at other people to see if they had seen it, but it was pretty clear the other people around me did not see it. if they did they would have been looking as dumbfounded as i was. i mean i can not get over it. this was just the clearest most blatent shiny spinning disc with insane flight ability.  wow.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw sterotypical metal shiny disc. maneuvered unlike any known aircraft.

content.detailedDescription: Was watching one large bright flashing light with smaller dimmer lights fly in and out from it when suddenly my dog started growling and  looked beside me and the there was a boomerang shaped aperation less than twenty feet away from us just above the power line was hovering and then flew away fast when we all turned over to see what was there seemed like it was glowing dimly. very silent. no one knew it was there until my dog saw. ran inside and went back out to see if we could still see the bright large light and it was gone
content.summary: Was watching one large bright flashing light with smaller dimmer lights fly in and out fromberg it when suddenly my dog started growling and  looked beside me and the there was a boomerang shaped aperation less than twenty feet away from us just above

content.detailedDescription: We were travelling down highway 42 when i looked to my left and saw three bright disk  lights in the sky at first i thought nothing of it until they started to more all around. i knew at that point it wasn't a oil rig but something was wrong. it became foggy around us and my protection team that i had been working with and following us right behind us lights in mirror disappeared. i stopped and got out of the car and started videotaping but heard no sound i wanted to go further down the road to investigate but my partner said no. however what we saw and the kind of structure was three balls of light and a secondary with three beams of light towards the ground. i have been in protection for a long time i know what i saw they were looking for something. plus the cloud formation around us lasted for at least twenty minutes because the cars that were right behind us disappeared and we were alone in a fog for that long and know one could find us. plus once we started driving again the fog started to disappear and i just wish my partner would have let me go and see what was going on. however i can take you to the place anytime you wish. thank darin potvin
content.summary: I am protection specialist and this was the most amazing event of my life and scariest. i do have video somewhere and will share it with you when i find it but it was the most amazing exeprerience and i know they are out there. concindering my years at tr

content.detailedDescription:
I just came out of my house at 5.30 pm ish south of london when i saw the object glittering and shining. it was high up in the air but because the sky was very blue you could see very well. i observed several orbs and balloons hovering around together . the orbs were bright white and the balloons were red and glowing and pulsating as bright as light bulbs. the movement of the tether , which was glowing and shining like the rest of the balloon, was weird going back and forth as if man controlled - not free. while checking one of the films and reducing the speed/ increasing sharpness i spotted a couple of orbs shooting at great speed ( see attached film). that' confirmed i was witnessing something out of the ordinary.

the second observation was what appeared to be a conical shape which seemed to swirl upon itself morphing into different bright white shapes. i filmed it quite a while. it was extremely shiny and appeared from where i stood to be moving downwards . i lost sight when it disappeared behind the houses and trees. 

upon slowing down the films ( taken on my iphone 6s) with some software i have downloaded i spotted some extremely fast moving objects that turned out to be white orbs - one of which turned into a cylinder metallic form for a fraction of a second.

i live on a path to heathrow airport and planes fly above my house at about 1,400 metres. the object were higher up for some but lower for others. for instance i could see the balloon and tether of one of the glowing  "balloons" well enough to state that they were not that high. i've also witnessed an orb flying fast (but not supersonicly fast) at around 1,000 metres height only. i could see it's cloudy and hazy exterior shape well enough.
content.summary: It's an area over london where i've seen these orbs and anomalies 4 times in the past year with the first observation  at  1,000 metres only

content.detailedDescription: Went outside around 5;15 am on sunday august 13,2017 after hearing strange sound from street at my mother's suburban home.  noticed bright light in eastern sky in twilight..It seemed stationary....Got binoculars and it was diamond shaped with separate lights on surface...Scores of lights ..A few looked bluish..But it did not move visibly.   i checked location of iss and it was above central russia going east...So it was not iss.   it was large....What was it?
content.summary: Stationary bright object; binoculars showed separate lights on diamond shape

content.detailedDescription:
My fiancee and i were outside having a cigarette when in my fiancee's peripheral she could see a light. she informed me and i looked up and thought maybe it could be a satellite, when it moved quickly towards what was an actual satellite. we noticed it had bright yellow, silver and orange lights and a green light on both the exterior and the surface of the ufo, we were staring at it when it suddenly just disappeared.

i didn't experience any sort of feelings except, for not being able to get a clear picture of what i saw, after the fact. my fiancee suddenly felt nauseous and dizzy, also, she had a headache as well. she seems to be having a hard time pin pointing the words to let me know how she felt, but all she could really come up with was: "it's such a strange, weird feeling that i can't really find the words to describe".
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Multicoloured lights we saw from our porch that moved towards a satalight

content.detailedDescription: Waiting for meteor shower here at 2:30am ets in brooklyn mew york, just now! my girlfriend was in the kitchen, i was on the balcony on the 11th story  waiting for her to come out with snacks. i looks over toward the brooklyn museum, then i saw a glowing object pass by rather quickly faster than a plane. i yelled for her to come out fast. it was still moving through the sky and she was unclear what it was, at that exact moment, and meteor flew across the sky. i live close to jkf and lga flight patters and i have been here for over 4 years. i see everything from helicopters, planes, private jets, baloons, drones, trash bags floating about..... this was none of those. nothing i have ever seen like this.
content.summary: Waiting for meteor shower here at 2:30am ets. my girlfriend was in the kitchen, i was on the balcony waiting for her to come out wirh snacks. i looks over toward the brooklyn meusem, then i saw a glowing object pass by rather quickly. faster than a plane.

content.detailedDescription: Laying out in the backyard about 830pm watching the night sky. first noticing satellites travelling, flickering of airplanes flying over when out of nowhere a streak of bright light appears catching our full attention. we then also notice a slow moving light heading northeast and disappearing out of nowhere, and reappearing a few minutes later travelling south until it also disappears out of nowhere.I then notices a full light flashing and heading south. within a few minutes, a triangular/boomerang shape object, misty white like flies over us a few hundred feet over at a steady moderate speed heading south and disappearing within 5 seconds of flight. just talking about it over and over gave me chills as i have never seen such a thing.Thereafter, as we continued laying there, another ball of light travelled south at high speed. withing and few more minutes, an orange ball flashed and also travelling at high such speed disappeared going west. as we kept staring at the sky, in awe and unbelief of what we were seeing, my wife caught what seemed like a black arrow tip travel east at at high speed and higher elevation, darker than the sky. there is no moon in the sky.
content.summary: Within the 2hrs seeing satellites, airplanes light then suddenly catching different lights striking throughout the sky, followed by sightings of 2 different objects and more strange lights.

content.detailedDescription:
Me, my brother and cousin were at my mums house. it was dark, late evening. we've witnessed a lot growing up. but this sighting sticks with me the most. my mum lives roughly a 10 minute walk from hollingbury golf course in brighton, uk. from the window at the top of the stairs, we had a good view of it. my brother noticed a green light moving back and fourth along the path of the golf course. there is a dew pond at the far end. it kept going to that, then back about half way. it was a green light, dancing in a circle. then it would move back to the dew pond. this went on for about 30 to 45 minutes. then it flew over to falmer, near to where brighton and hove albion's football stadium is now. then it came back to the dew pond and carried on doing what it did before. dancing in a circular motion. 

after, it flew over to the race course. the light turned red. it stopped completely for a few minutes. then shot into the sky in a diagonal line. it came back to the golf course. the whole time, me and my brother were outside on the driveway. my cousin was freaked out and stayed in the house. my mum was a sleep on the sofa because she had a migraine. if this wasn't strange enough, on my life, it hovered above the house completely black. no lights. but it was the shape of a helicopter, no sound. me and my brother looked at it for about 5 minutes. if you put the house, or 2 houses on top, that was how high up it was. i dont have the best eyesight. but it was close enough for me to see the outline of it. then it went back to the dew pond and moving back and fourth again.

i remember being excited about what i was seeing. i tried to record it on my phone. but the cameras back then weren't the best. i was calm throughout and weren't scared at all. not even when it hovered above the house. but, after writing this, and no matter how many people i tell my story to. i can never remember how it dissapeared. 

this isn't the only story i have. my brother messaged me a week later to tell me it was back. my mum has stories. my friends who grew up with me on that street have stories. winter months, october to january are the most active. there is a flight path for planes over that way. but this object was above the trees on the golf course. it was not a plane, or helicopter. it was just the shape of a helicopter. the way it was moving wasn't like anything i've ever seen. only on star wars. it was a clear night. i can remember a lot in great detail. my mum wanted to contact a group of ufo researchers to stay at our home to investigate. but we never found a number. my friend showed me hanger one. i'd never heard of you guys. but i'm more than happy to share this story, and others that i have with you. thanks for your time.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: It was a green light moving back and fourth, then dancing in a circle.

content.detailedDescription: Craft spotted over stated address. pulled my vehicle over to the side of the road to get a better look, turn down radio 10pm. observed craft when it darted down road to the west, then returned several times. the craft moved so rapidly that it looked like it blinked and was down the road, then repeated that type of travel several times. moreover, it then proceeded to come toward me and i fled, was really scared. i noticed when i went to leave that 15 min had gone by according to the clock in my car. additionally, my car was turned off, i don't remember turning it off. one other thing, road was under construction and traffic was absent, i was by myself.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Craft darted down road to the west, then returned several times.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in car watching meteor shower. no meteors but 2 swirling dark orbs flew overhead from north to south
content.summary: 2 orbs, dark. flew close together. i saw these a few years back in pigeon forge tn during a prior meteor shower

content.detailedDescription:
Four adults ages 50 to 74 witness a bright light traveling at a constant speed , constant elevation a total of 4 objects observed over a approximate 5 min span . they seemed to all be traveling in the same flight path and they all suddenly disappeared. they were just gone like someone turned off the lights in a house.                                                                             four adults were sitting on the patio talking when i noticed this
strange light in the sky. i did not know what it was.  it was a reddish orange object that looked flat moving across the sky.  we continued watching and four of the objects came on the same flight path one at a time about two to three minutes apart.  they flew across traveling from the west of our location in a northwest to southeast direction and suddenly disappeared.  pictures were taken with a cell phone and when enlarged they appear white with a orange border rectangular shape the length is approximately three times the height.  the last one when viewed thru binoculars appeared as a triangle white with an orange border all around it.
content.summary: Bright orange/red light traveling at constsant speed when pictures of object is enlarged white light rectangle shaped

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the meteor shower with my father. after about 45 minutes, i noticed a flash. at first, i thought it was a drone. then i realized the height of the object, appearing to be the altitude of a satellite. i pointed it out to my dad and he was also perplexed. it kept flashing, moving slowly across the night sky. at some points it flashed brightly, like a strobe light. i got my mom and she also had no clue of what it was. we observed the object for about 10 minutes as its flashes got dimmer and dimmer until it was not view able anymore. my mother went inside and my dad and i talked about the sighting. about 15 minutes later, we saw another flash. we thought it was another plane but it was moving very fast, too fast to be one. it moved in a zigzag pattern until it was blocked by trees. it had appeared to be chasing a plane and it was about a mile high. its flashes were nearly exactly like the flashes of the ufo we saw earlier. i have seen a ufo before in the area and now i have seen three.
content.summary: First a flashing light with occasional flashes that were really bright, second one slightly erratic movement with flashes

content.detailedDescription:
Standing on our patio, my lady and i were looking at the stars at late dusk.  she was along what one was that appeared to be a planet.  solid white, not blinking or flickering.  i then looked to the east and noticed one similar i hadn't seen the moment before and it faded out to a barely visible point of light and then disappeared.  i waited to see it reappear but it did not.

she and i were both intrigued and have both seen similar phenomena before.
content.summary: Star or planet like object

content.detailedDescription: My wife and kids were outside when they first spotted them. they called me out and i saw around 11 or 12 blue orbs. it was really cloudy and we could see them clear as day. they were heading north right over our house. we tried to record them with our phones but we couldn't get a clear picture or recording. we watched them until they disappeared.
content.summary: Blue balls of light below clouds. flying in formation with one trailing behind

content.detailedDescription: Multiple white orbs, disc, to the very ceiling of the sky moving in random patterns, almost as if dog fighting with each other, there were 2 white solid disc which seemed to get ganged up on by the rest, the rest numbered from 4-6, these were flashing white repeatedly but also at times cloaked and de-cloaked and at times were solid white as well, from the se another appeared but stayed stationary, once this one arrived they all vanished but to appear in another quadrant again playing with each other extremely closely, again, as if dog fighting, the objects were fast and made sharp left and right turns but also went is very fast circle patterns while they were in circulating one of the other objects. no video was attempted due to the extreme high distance these objects were located and neither my mobile or canon camera would be able to capture it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: An out of this world experience, amazing to look at and sureal

content.detailedDescription:
I live in the azores islands, on the middle of the atlantic ocean. 
i was eating outside, when we saw a big star-like light, going from north to south of the city of angra do heroísmo. it was going slow, no sounds made. we checked on flightradar24 for planes and there were none (i have screenshot). we searched the position of the international space station and the direction of it's movement was completely diferen (it was from west to east, and i have screenshot too). 
i took a picture with my nikon camera at 200mm and it seems like a round object with lights on the surface.
content.summary: Extrange movement, really shiny, going slow above our heads.
